channel.title: ASX:QAN on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: Qantas Reports Profit Jump and Orders More Jets as Demand Holds
item.description: Qantas Airways Ltd. reported a 15% jump in full-year earnings and ordered more Airbus SE jets as demand for flights shows little sign of faltering.

item.title: Qantas Stock Hits Record High After CEO Flags Strong Demand
